body:
Comment 5: 
I've tried to use goinstall and it seems to work, but 2 issues:

1) How do I "clean" or "nuke" after I have finished my run? goinstall creates all these
files and pkg and bin directories. I can't leave them, can I?

2) "goinstall -make=false ..." doesn't work because it does not process *.c files. It
does add them to on-the-fly Makefile, so "goinstall -make=true ..." works properly.
